prefixIntro.title: N 开头核心词
prefixIntro.description: 高中阶段 N 开头的高频混合词汇。
prefixIntro.imagery: 字母 N 像连接两点的通道或鼻子（Nose），常含“连接、否定（No）”之意。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M3 20 l 9 -15 l 9 15 h -18 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M9 10 l 4 7' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='17' cy='6' r='3' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 巍峨的山脉（大地）与天边的太阳（天空）共同构成了“自然”这个宏大的概念。

sentences.en: The student should develop some skills to live in nature.
sentences.cn: 学生应该培养一些在自然界中生存的技能。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='8' width='6' height='12' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><rect x='14' y='8' width='6' height='12' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M10 14 h4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-dasharray='2 2'/>
words.imagery: 两座并排的房子，中间有一条连接线，表示居住得很近。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='9' cy='10' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='15' cy='10' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M8 15 l2 -1 l2 1 l2 -1 l2 1' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个流着汗、嘴角颤抖的紧张表情。

sentences.en: She was so nervous about her exams that she couldn't sleep.
sentences.cn: 她对考试如此紧张以至于睡不着觉。

words.imagery: 混乱无序的声波线条，高低错落，象征着刺耳、不和谐的声音。

sentences.en: There is so much noise outside. It's too noisy.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 14 a 8 8 0 0 0 16 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M7 10 q 2.5 -3 5 0 t 5 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M7 12 q 2.5 -3 5 0 t 5 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.7'/>
words.imagery: 一个半圆形的碗里盛着几条弯曲的波浪线，形象地代表了面条。

sentences.en: People from the northern part of China like to have noodles.
sentences.cn: 中国北方人喜欢吃面条。

words.imagery: 一个没有任何特殊标记的标准人形图标。

sentences.en: He is just a normal person.

words.imagery: 侧面带有螺旋线圈的笔记本。

sentences.en: You can take notes in a notebook.
sentences.cn: 你可以在笔记本上记笔记。
